name: Quake Live
description: This version uses D9VK, which greatly improves performance but may not work completely correctly.
content:
files:
  - d9vk: https://github.com/Zeioth/zeioth-lutris/raw/master/utils/d9vk64.zip
game:
  appid: 282440
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/windows/system32/
    file: d9vk
    format: zip
system:
  disable_compositor: 'true'
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: devinfo,frametimes,fps
    DXVK_LOG_LEVEL: none
    STAGING_SHARED_MEMORY: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
winesteam:
  esync: true
  overrides:
    d3d10.dll: native
    d3d10_1.dll: native
    d3d10core.dll: native
    d3d9.dll: native
    dxgi.dll: native
